movie.title: What Every Woman Wants
movie.description_intro: A newly wed couple have no option to move in with parents.Whilst trying to maintain their relationship without any privacy.
movie.description_full: A newly wed couple have no option to move in with parents.Whilst trying to maintain their relationship without any privacy.

movies.title: Red Dog
movies.summary: In the tradition of Hachi: A Dog's Tale (2009), this is the story of a legendary, lovable red dog who roamed the outback looking for his original master, finding his way into the hearts of everyone he meets, bringing people and communities together, some who find love, and others who find themselves. Based on true events.

Based on true events.

movies.title: Nimbe: The Movie
movies.summary: Nimbe is the story of a teenager suffering from parental negligence, constantly being bullied by his peers but finds consolation, love and relevance in a street gang he is introduced to by an older neighbor who he meets by chance. In this company, he is introduced to the dangerous world of drugs, hooliganism, thuggery etc. where he experiences the accompanying challenges and consequences prevalent of such a life. Crime, prostitution, cultism, corruption and other such social vices are among the themes to be expressed through the movie.

movies.title: The Forbidden Dance
movies.summary: A princess in the Amazon rain forest tries to fight a conglomerate threatening the forests by going to Los Angeles. There she links up with a rich kid who tells her that she must get on TV to succeed with her mission. The two come up with the idea of winning a lambada dance contest that is getting TV attention.

movies.title: Wuff
movies.summary: The lives of four best friends Ella, Cecile, Lulu and Silke are turned upside down, and the dogs are involved in a decisive way.
